var.name: recNum
var.description: number of the measure data of the study area

var.name: lowerX
var.description: the lower limit of the parameter

var.name: upperX
var.description: the upper limit of the parameter

var.name: Xi
var.description: the parameter value in the evolution

var.name: runoffData
var.description: measure data of the study area

var.name: forecastrunoffData
var.description: the forecast data of the study area

var.name: Obji
var.description: the current object function value of the parameter

var.name: Objj
var.description: the object function value of the evolution parameter

var.name: inCycle
var.description: the flag indicate whether in the evolution cycle

var.name: evaResult
var.description: the evaluation result of parameter of the model
